data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Nicobar Islands, Andaman and Nicobar, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nicobar Islands, Andaman and Nicobar, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Nicobar Islands that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 405 believers in Nicobar Islands against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Nicobar Islands.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Shom Pens people.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Nicobar Islands, Andaman and Nicobar, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Nicobar Islands, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.focus_label: Nicobar Islands, Andaman and Nicobar, India

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Nicobar Islands an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Nicobar Islands
location.full_name: Nicobar Islands, Andaman and Nicobar, India
